member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.Width
member.summary: The subworld's width.

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.Height
member.summary: The subworld's height.

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.Tasks
member.summary: The subworld's generation tasks.

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.ShouldSave
member.summary: Whether the subworld should save or not. Default: false

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.NoPlayerSaving
member.summary: Reverts changes to players when they leave the subworld. Default: false

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.NormalUpdates
member.summary: Completely disables vanilla world updating in the subworld. Do not enable unless you are replicating a standard world! Default: false

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.OnEnter
member.summary: Called when entering a subworld. Before this is called, the return button and underworld's visibility are reset.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.OnExit
member.summary: Called when exiting a subworld. After this is called, the return button and underworld's visibility are reset.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.OnLoad
member.summary: Called after the subworld generates or loads from file.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.OnUnload
member.summary: Called while leaving the subworld, before a different world generates or loads from file.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.DrawSetup(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameTime)
member.summary: Corrects zoom and clears the screen, then calls DrawMenu and draws the cursor.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.DrawMenu(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameTime)
member.summary: Called by DrawSetup to draw the subworld's loading menu. Defaults to text on a black background.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.GetLight(Terraria.Tile,System.Int32,System.Int32,Terraria.Utilities.FastRandom@,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector3@)
member.summary: Controls how a tile in the subworld is lit. Return true to disable vanilla behaviour. Default: false

member.name: F:SubworldLibrary.SubworldSystem.playerLocations
member.summary: Used by the main server to direct packets for a client to the subserver the client is in.

member.name: F:SubworldLibrary.SubworldSystem.noReturn
member.summary: Hides the Return button. Its value is reset before OnEnter is called, and after OnExit is called.

member.name: F:SubworldLibrary.SubworldSystem.hideUnderworld
member.summary: Hides the Underworld background. Its value is reset before OnEnter is called, and after OnExit is called.

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.SubworldSystem.Current
member.summary: The current subworld.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.SubworldSystem.IsActive(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if the current subworld's ID matches the specified ID.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.SubworldSystem.IsActive``1
member.summary: Returns true if the specified subworld is active.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.SubworldSystem.AnyActive(Terraria.ModLoader.Mod)
member.summary: Returns true if the current subworld is from the specified mod.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.SubworldSystem.AnyActive``1
member.summary: Returns true if the current subworld is from the specified mod.

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.SubworldSystem.CurrentPath
member.summary: The current subworld's file path.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.SubworldSystem.Enter(System.String)
member.summary: Tries to enter a subworld with the specified ID.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.SubworldSystem.Enter``1
member.summary: Enters the specified subworld.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.SubworldSystem.Exit
member.summary: Exits the current subworld.
